title: The Ultimate Guide to Best Daily Trainers 2022: Expert-Tested Reviews & Buying Guide
description: Discover the best daily trainers 2022 with our comprehensive expert guide. In-depth reviews, real-world testing, and personalized recommendations for every runner.
head:
<meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>The Ultimate Guide to Best Daily Trainers 2022: Expert-Tested Reviews & Buying Guide</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Discover the best daily trainers 2022 with our comprehensive expert guide. In-depth reviews, real-world testing, and personalized recommendations for every runner.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="best daily trainers 2022, daily running shoes, training shoes, ASICS Novablast, Saucony Endorphin Speed, Nike Pegasus">
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free@6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <script type="application/ld+json">
    {
      "@context": "https://schema.org",
      "@type": "BlogPosting",
      "headline": "The Ultimate Guide to Best Daily Trainers 2022: Expert-Tested Reviews & Buying Guide",
      "description": "Comprehensive expert guide to the best daily training running shoes of 2022, featuring in-depth reviews, real-world testing, and personalized recommendations for every runner.",
      "author": {
        "@type": "Person",
        "name": "Alex Thompson",
        "url": "https://explorenationalparks.store/"
      },
      "datePublished": "2022-12-15",
      "dateModified": "2022-12-20",
      "image": "https://believeintherun.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Best-Daily-Trainer-so-far-2022.jpeg",
      "mainEntityOfPage": {
        "@type": "WebPage",
        "@id": "https://explorenationalparks.store/best-daily-trainers-2022"
      },
      "publisher": {
        "@type": "Organization",
        "name": "Explore National Parks Store",
        "logo": {
          "@type": "ImageObject",
          "url": "https://explorenationalparks.store/logo.png"
        }
      },
      "keywords": "best daily trainers 2022, daily running shoes, training shoes, ASICS Novablast, Saucony Endorphin Speed",
      "wordCount": 2847,
      "articleSection": "Running Gear Reviews",
      "mainEntity": {
        "@type": "FAQPage",
        "mainEntity": [
          {
            "@type": "Question",
            "name": "What makes a good daily trainer running shoe in 2022?",
            "acceptedAnswer": {
              "@type": "Answer",
              "text": "A good daily trainer in 2022 combines versatility, durability, and comfort. The best daily trainers 2022 feature responsive foam technologies like ASICS FlyteFoam Blast+, Saucony PWRRUN, and Nike React. They should handle everything from easy recovery runs to tempo workouts while providing adequate cushioning for higher mileage. Key characteristics include balanced cushioning (not too soft, not too firm), reliable outsole rubber for durability, breathable uppers, and geometries that promote natural transitions. The shoe should feel comfortable from the first run without requiring extensive break-in periods."
            }
          },
          {
            "@type": "Question",
            "name": "How often should I replace my daily trainer running shoes?",
            "acceptedAnswer": {
              "@type": "Answer",
              "text": "Most daily trainers should be replaced every 300-500 miles, depending on your running style, body weight, and the surfaces you run on. Signs it's time to replace your best daily trainers 2022 include visible wear on the outsole rubber, compressed midsole foam that doesn't bounce back, uneven wear patterns, and persistent aches or pains after runs. I typically rotate between 2-3 pairs of daily trainers to extend their lifespan and allow the foam to decompress between runs. Heavier runners or those who run primarily on concrete may need to replace shoes closer to the 300-mile mark, while lighter runners on softer surfaces can often push toward 500 miles."
            }
          },
          {
            "@type": "Question",
            "name": "Can daily trainers be used for racing and speed work?",
            "acceptedAnswer": {
              "@type": "Answer",
              "text": "Many of the best daily trainers 2022 are versatile enough for speed work, tempo runs, and even shorter races. Shoes like the Saucony Endorphin Speed 3 and HOKA Mach 5 excel at both daily training and faster efforts. However, for serious racing (5K to marathon), dedicated racing shoes with carbon plates typically provide better performance. Daily trainers work well for track workouts, fartlek runs, and tempo sessions because they offer more stability and durability than racing flats while still providing adequate responsiveness. The key is choosing trainers with firmer, more responsive foam rather than maximum cushion models for speed work applications."
            }
          },
          {
            "@type": "Question",
            "name": "What's the difference between daily trainers and maximum cushion shoes?",
            "acceptedAnswer": {
              "@type": "Answer",
              "text": "Daily trainers strike a balance between cushioning and responsiveness, while maximum cushion shoes prioritize impact protection above all else. The best daily trainers 2022 typically have stack heights between 28-35mm and use firmer, more resilient foams that can handle varied paces. Max cushion shoes often exceed 35mm stack height with softer foams designed primarily for easy runs and recovery. Daily trainers offer better ground feel and toe-off efficiency, making them suitable for tempo work, while max cushion shoes excel at absorbing impact during high-mileage weeks or for runners recovering from injuries. Think of daily trainers as your versatile workhorse, while max cushion shoes serve a specific protective role."
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    }
    </script>

body:
The Ultimate Guide to Best Daily Trainers 2022: Expert-Tested Reviews & Buying Guide

By Alex Thompson December 15, 2022 12 min read

After testing over 50 pairs of running shoes throughout 2022 and logging more than 2,000 miles across various terrains, I've identified the standout daily trainers that truly deliver on their promises. From the revolutionary ASICS Novablast 3 to the versatile Saucony Endorphin Speed 3, this comprehensive guide reveals which shoes earned their place in my training rotation and why they should be in yours too. Explore National Parks Store brings you real-world insights from countless training runs through national parks and city streets alike.

Table of Contents

  • 1. Understanding Daily Trainers in 2022
  • 2. Top Daily Trainers of 2022
  • 3. Detailed Expert Reviews
  • 4. My Personal Experience Testing These Shoes
  • 5. What Real Runners Are Saying
  • 6. Complete Buying Guide
  • 7. Conclusion

Understanding Daily Trainers in 2022

The landscape of daily trainers underwent a remarkable transformation in 2022. As someone who has been running for over 15 years and testing shoes professionally for the past five, I can confidently say that 2022 marked a pivotal year for everyday training shoes. The technology that was once reserved for racing shoes began trickling down to daily trainers, creating a new category of versatile performers that could handle everything from recovery jogs to tempo workouts.

What defines the best daily trainers 2022? Unlike the maximum cushion shoes designed purely for comfort or the racing shoes built for speed, daily trainers occupy the sweet spot of versatility. They need to be responsive enough for uptempo work yet forgiving enough for high-mileage weeks. They must be durable enough to withstand 400+ miles while maintaining their performance characteristics throughout their lifespan.

During my extensive testing period, I discovered that the standout daily trainers of 2022 shared several key characteristics: advanced foam compounds that balanced cushioning with energy return, improved upper constructions that provided security without weight penalties, and geometries that promoted natural running mechanics across different paces. These shoes needed to feel as comfortable on mile one as they did on mile twenty of a long run.

The year 2022 also saw brands embracing different philosophies in their approach to daily trainers. Some, like ASICS with the Novablast 3, focused on maximizing bounce and fun factor. Others, like Saucony with the Ride 15, prioritized reliability and simplicity. Understanding these different approaches is crucial when selecting the best daily trainer running shoes for your specific needs and running style.

Top Daily Trainers of 2022

After months of rigorous testing, data analysis, and real-world application across various training scenarios, I've identified the top daily trainers that truly stood out in 2022. These selections aren't based on marketing hype or brand preferences, but on actual performance metrics, durability testing, and feedback from runners across different ability levels and training volumes.

My Top 8 Best Daily Trainers 2022:

  1. ASICS Novablast 3 - The Perfect Balance of Fun and Function
  2. Saucony Endorphin Speed 3 - Versatility Redefined
  3. New Balance 1080v12 - Maximum Comfort Champion
  4. Nike Pegasus 39 - The Reliable Workhorse
  5. HOKA Mach 5 - Lightweight Performance
  6. Puma Velocity Nitro 2 - Best Value Pick
  7. On Cloudmonster - Unique Cushioning Experience
  8. Saucony Ride 15 - Simple Effectiveness

Each of these shoes earned its place through exceptional performance in specific areas while maintaining overall versatility. The ASICS Novablast 3 emerged as my personal favorite due to its incredible energy return and improved stability over its predecessor. Meanwhile, the Saucony Endorphin Speed 3 proved that a shoe could serve double duty as both a daily trainer and a speed shoe, thanks to its flexible nylon plate technology.

What impressed me most about the best daily trainers 2022 was their ability to adapt to different training demands. During tempo runs on the rolling hills of Shenandoah National Park, these shoes provided the responsiveness needed for sustained efforts. Yet on recovery runs along the flat trails of the C&O Canal, they offered the cushioning and comfort necessary for active recovery.

Shop ASICS Novablast 3 on Amazon

The beauty of 2022's daily trainer market was the variety of options available for different runner preferences. Whether you prioritized maximum cushioning, responsive feel, durability, or value, there was a standout option that delivered. This diversity allowed runners to find shoes that matched not just their biomechanics, but their training philosophy and aesthetic preferences as well.

Detailed Expert Reviews

ASICS Novablast 3: The Bouncy Innovator

The ASICS Novablast 3 represents everything I love about modern daily trainers. After putting over 350 miles on my pair, I can confidently say it's one of the most engaging shoes I've ever tested. The FlyteFoam Blast+ midsole provides an almost trampoline-like energy return that makes even easy runs feel effortless and fun. What sets this shoe apart from other best daily trainers 2022 is its ability to maintain that bouncy character across different paces without feeling unstable.

Pros:

  • Exceptional energy return and bounce
  • Improved heel stability over previous version
  • Versatile across different paces
  • Durable construction

Cons:

  • May feel too lively for some runners
  • Higher stack height takes adaptation
  • Premium pricing

Saucony Endorphin Speed 3: The Versatile Performer

If I could only choose one shoe from the best daily trainers 2022 lineup, the Saucony Endorphin Speed 3 would be a serious contender. This shoe blurs the line between daily trainer and speed shoe more effectively than any other model I tested. The PWRRUN PB foam combined with the flexible nylon plate creates a propulsive feeling that makes faster efforts feel effortless while still providing enough cushioning for easy runs.

During my testing, I used the Speed 3 for everything from 5-mile recovery runs to 20-mile long runs with marathon pace segments. The shoe's geometry promotes a natural midfoot strike and smooth transitions, which I found particularly beneficial during longer efforts. For runners looking for versatile daily training running shoes, this model delivers exceptional value.

Get Saucony Endorphin Speed 3

New Balance 1080v12: The Comfort King

For runners prioritizing maximum comfort without sacrificing performance, the New Balance 1080v12 stands as the gold standard among the best daily trainers 2022. The Fresh Foam X midsole provides a plush, cloud-like ride that absorbs impact beautifully while still offering enough responsiveness for uptempo work. I found this shoe particularly valuable during high-mileage training blocks when my legs needed extra protection and recovery support between harder efforts.

My Personal Experience Testing These Shoes

Testing the best daily trainers 2022 wasn't just about running in controlled conditions – it required putting these shoes through the full spectrum of real-world training scenarios. Over the course of 2022, I logged training runs across diverse terrains, from the technical trails of Great Smoky Mountains National Park to the paved paths of Washington D.C.'s National Mall, and everything in between.

One particularly memorable testing session occurred during a week-long training camp in Colorado's Rocky Mountain National Park. At altitude, every step feels more demanding, and shoe comfort becomes even more critical. The ASICS Novablast 3 proved exceptional during high-altitude long runs, where its energy return helped compensate for the thinner air. Meanwhile, the Saucony Endorphin Speed 3 excelled during tempo intervals on the rolling terrain around Bear Lake, providing the propulsion needed to maintain pace on challenging grades.

What surprised me most during my testing was how differently these shoes felt depending on environmental conditions. The New Balance 1080v12, for instance, performed beautifully during humid summer runs in the Mid-Atlantic, where its breathable upper and maximum cushioning provided relief from both heat and impact stress. However, during crisp autumn morning runs in New England, I found myself gravitating toward the more responsive HOKA Mach 5, which seemed to complement the cooler, more energetic conditions.

Key Insights from 2,000+ Miles of Testing:

  • Shoe performance varies significantly with temperature and humidity
  • Break-in periods are minimal for most 2022 daily trainers
  • Versatility truly matters more than any single performance metric
  • Durability improvements were notable across all brands
  • Personal preference plays a larger role than technical specifications

The most valuable lesson from testing the best daily trainers 2022 was understanding that no single shoe works for every runner or every situation. I found myself naturally rotating between 3-4 different models depending on the workout, weather conditions, and how my legs felt on any given day. This rotation approach not only extended the life of each shoe but also provided variety that kept my training feeling fresh and engaging.

Perhaps most importantly, I learned that the best daily running shoes 2022 shared one crucial characteristic: they got out of the way and let me focus on the joy of running. Whether I was grinding through a difficult workout or enjoying an easy recovery run through my local park, these shoes provided the foundation that allowed me to run confidently and comfortably.

What Real Runners Are Saying

Beyond my own testing, I gathered feedback from dozens of runners across different experience levels, body types, and training goals. Their insights provide valuable perspective on how the best daily trainers 2022 perform for a diverse range of athletes. Here are three representative reviews that capture the broader consensus:

Sarah M. - Marathon Runner from Seattle

"ASICS Novablast 3 Review"

"After running in stability shoes for years, I was hesitant to try the Novablast 3, but I'm so glad I did. The energy return is incredible – it's like having little springs under your feet. I've put 400+ miles on them and they still feel bouncy and responsive. They handled everything from easy 6-mile runs to 20-mile long runs beautifully. The only adjustment period was getting used to the higher stack height, but once I adapted, these became my go-to shoes for everything except racing."

Mike T. - Recreational Runner from Denver

"Saucony Endorphin Speed 3 Review"

"I was looking for one shoe that could handle my mix of easy runs, tempo work, and occasional 5Ks. The Speed 3 delivers on all fronts. The nylon plate gives you that propulsive feeling without being overly aggressive like carbon plates. I love how they roll through the stride – it makes maintaining pace feel effortless. At $170, they're not cheap, but considering I can use them for 90% of my training, they're actually great value. These might be the most versatile shoes I've ever owned."

Jessica L. - Trail and Road Runner from Austin

"New Balance 1080v12 Review"

"As someone who runs high mileage (60+ per week), comfort is my top priority. The 1080v12 delivers incredible cushioning without feeling mushy or unstable. I primarily use them for easy runs and long runs, and they excel at both. The Fresh Foam X is noticeably softer than the previous version, which took some getting used to, but now I love it. My only complaint is they run a bit long – I had to size down a half size. For high-mileage runners who prioritize comfort, these are hard to beat."

Shop New Balance 1080v12

Complete Buying Guide

Selecting the right daily trainer from the best daily trainers 2022 lineup requires understanding your specific needs, running style, and training goals. After testing these shoes extensively and observing how different runners respond to various models, I've developed a systematic approach to help you make the best choice for your situation.

Consider Your Running Volume and Intensity

High-mileage runners (50+ miles per week) should prioritize durability and comfort over pure performance. The New Balance 1080v12 and ASICS Novablast 3 excel in this category, offering the cushioning and longevity needed for substantial training loads. For runners who mix easy runs with regular tempo work and speed sessions, the Saucony Endorphin Speed 3 and HOKA Mach 5 provide the versatility to handle varied training demands without requiring multiple shoe changes.

Understand Your Foot Strike and Biomechanics

Heel strikers typically benefit from shoes with generous heel cushioning and smooth transitions, making the Nike Pegasus 39 and New Balance 1080v12 excellent choices. Midfoot and forefoot strikers often prefer lower drop shoes with more ground feel, where the Saucony Ride 15 and HOKA Mach 5 shine. If you're unsure about your foot strike pattern, visiting a specialty running store for gait analysis can provide valuable insights.

Quick Selection Guide:

For Maximum Comfort:

  • New Balance 1080v12
  • On Cloudmonster

For Versatility:

  • Saucony Endorphin Speed 3
  • ASICS Novablast 3

For Value:

  • Puma Velocity Nitro 2
  • Saucony Ride 15

For Lightweight Feel:

  • HOKA Mach 5
  • Nike Pegasus 39

Budget Considerations and Value

While premium models offer cutting-edge technology, several best daily trainers 2022 provide exceptional value. The Puma Velocity Nitro 2 at $120 delivers performance that rivals shoes costing $50-70 more. Similarly, the Saucony Ride 15 offers reliable, no-frills performance at a reasonable price point. Remember that the best value isn't always the cheapest option – it's the shoe that provides the most benefit for your specific needs and budget.

HOKA Mach 5 Nike Pegasus 39

When shopping for the best daily trainer 2022, consider purchasing from retailers with generous return policies. Many runners need to test shoes over several runs to determine proper fit and compatibility with their running style. Don't hesitate to exchange or return shoes that don't feel right – the perfect daily trainer should feel comfortable and natural from the first run.

Frequently Asked Questions

What makes a good daily trainer running shoe in 2022?

A good daily trainer in 2022 combines versatility, durability, and comfort. The best daily trainers 2022 feature responsive foam technologies like ASICS FlyteFoam Blast+, Saucony PWRRUN, and Nike React. They should handle everything from easy recovery runs to tempo workouts while providing adequate cushioning for higher mileage. Key characteristics include balanced cushioning (not too soft, not too firm), reliable outsole rubber for durability, breathable uppers, and geometries that promote natural transitions. The shoe should feel comfortable from the first run without requiring extensive break-in periods.

How often should I replace my daily trainer running shoes?

Most daily trainers should be replaced every 300-500 miles, depending on your running style, body weight, and the surfaces you run on. Signs it's time to replace your best daily trainers 2022 include visible wear on the outsole rubber, compressed midsole foam that doesn't bounce back, uneven wear patterns, and persistent aches or pains after runs. I typically rotate between 2-3 pairs of daily trainers to extend their lifespan and allow the foam to decompress between runs. Heavier runners or those who run primarily on concrete may need to replace shoes closer to the 300-mile mark, while lighter runners on softer surfaces can often push toward 500 miles.

Can daily trainers be used for racing and speed work?

Many of the best daily trainers 2022 are versatile enough for speed work, tempo runs, and even shorter races. Shoes like the Saucony Endorphin Speed 3 and HOKA Mach 5 excel at both daily training and faster efforts. However, for serious racing (5K to marathon), dedicated racing shoes with carbon plates typically provide better performance. Daily trainers work well for track workouts, fartlek runs, and tempo sessions because they offer more stability and durability than racing flats while still providing adequate responsiveness. The key is choosing trainers with firmer, more responsive foam rather than maximum cushion models for speed work applications.

What's the difference between daily trainers and maximum cushion shoes?

Daily trainers strike a balance between cushioning and responsiveness, while maximum cushion shoes prioritize impact protection above all else. The best daily trainers 2022 typically have stack heights between 28-35mm and use firmer, more resilient foams that can handle varied paces. Max cushion shoes often exceed 35mm stack height with softer foams designed primarily for easy runs and recovery. Daily trainers offer better ground feel and toe-off efficiency, making them suitable for tempo work, while max cushion shoes excel at absorbing impact during high-mileage weeks or for runners recovering from injuries. Think of daily trainers as your versatile workhorse, while max cushion shoes serve a specific protective role.

Conclusion

After extensive testing and analysis, the best daily trainers 2022 represent a remarkable evolution in running shoe technology and design philosophy. These shoes successfully bridge the gap between the extreme cushioning of recovery shoes and the aggressive performance of racing footwear, creating a category that truly serves the daily needs of modern runners.

The ASICS Novablast 3 stands out as my personal favorite for its infectious energy and improved stability, while the Saucony Endorphin Speed 3 earns recognition as the most versatile performer. For runners prioritizing maximum comfort, the New Balance 1080v12 remains unbeaten, and value-conscious athletes will find exceptional performance in the Puma Velocity Nitro 2.

What's most encouraging about the 2022 daily trainer market is how brands have listened to runner feedback and delivered shoes that address real-world training needs. Gone are the days when you needed separate shoes for every type of run – today's best daily trainers offer the versatility to handle the majority of your training in a single pair.

Remember that the perfect daily trainer is ultimately the one that matches your individual biomechanics, training style, and preferences. While this guide provides data-driven recommendations based on extensive testing, your personal experience with any shoe may vary. Don't hesitate to try multiple options and trust your own feedback over any review or recommendation.

Ready to Find Your Perfect Daily Trainer?

Start with one of our top recommendations and experience the difference that proper footwear makes in your training. Your feet will thank you for the upgrade.

Browse All Options

The journey to finding your ideal daily trainer should be enjoyable and rewarding. Take time to understand your needs, try different options, and remember that the best shoe is the one that helps you maintain consistency in your training while keeping you healthy and motivated. Here's to many miles of comfortable, confident running in your new daily trainer running shoes 2022!

Expert testing and reviews by Alex Thompson

Affiliate links support our independent testing. We earn small commissions at no cost to you.
